title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, Lies-Collection 34 (Israel 8)
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 34 (Israel 8):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Abdo - Captive Revolution; Palestinian Women's Anti-Colonial Struggle within the Israeli Prison System (2014)

-  Alpher - No End of Conflict; Rethinking Israel-Palestine (2016)

-  Barghouti & Soueif - I Saw Ramallah (2000)

-  Bornstein - Crossing the Green Line Between the West Band and Israel (2002)

-  Brown - Palestinian Politics after the Oslo Accords; Resuming Arab Palestine (2003)

-  Bruggemann - Chosen; Reading the Bible Amid the Israeli-Palestinian Conflict (2015)

-  Chomsky - Fateful Triangle; The United States, Israel, and the Palestinians, updated ed. (1999)

-  Chomsky & Pappe - On Palestine (2015)

-  Cleary - Literature, Partition and the Nation State; Culture and Conflict in Ireland, Israel and Palestine (2004)

-  Davis - America and the Holy Land, with Eyes Toward Zion-IV (1995)

-  Efrat - The West Bank and Gaza Strip; a Geography of Occupation and Disengagement (2006)

-  Finkelstein - Image and Reality of the Israel-Palestine Conflict, 2e (2003)

-  Golani - The End of the British Mandate for Palestine, 1948; the Diary of Sir Henry Gurney (2009)

-  Hajjar - Courting Conflict; the Israeli Military Court System in the West Bank and Gaza (2005)

-  HRW - A Raw Deal; Abuses of Thai Workers in Israel's Agricultural Sector (2015)

-  Karsh - The Arab-Israeli Conflict; the Palestine War, 1948 (2002)

-  Kedourie & Haim (Eds.) - Zionism and Arabism in Palestine and Israel (1982)

-  Khalidi - Palestinian Identity; the Construction of Modern National Consciousness (1997)

-  Liebreich - Britain's Naval and Political Reaction to the Illegal Immigration of Jews to Palestine, 1945-1948 (2005)

-  Lock & Irving - Gaza Beneath the Bombs (2010)

-  Lockman - Comrades and Enemies; Arab and Jewish Workers in Palestine, 1906-1948 (1996)

-  McDonald - My Voice is my Weapon; Music, Nationalism, and the Poetics of Palestinian Resistance (2013)

-  Monterescu - Jaffa, Shared and Shattered; Contrived Coexistence in Israel-Palestine (2015)

-  Natanel - Sustaining Conflict; Apathy and Domination in Israel-Palestine (2016)

-  Pappe (Ed.) - Israel and South Africa; the Many Faces of Apartheid (2015)

-  Peters & Newman(Eds.)  - The Routledge Handbook on the Israeli-Palestinian Conflict (2013)

-  Prashad (Ed.) - Letters to Palestine; Writers Respond to War and Occupation (2015)

-  Predictions of the Third War on Gaza, Al Jazeera Center for Studies (July 2014)

-  Qafisheh - The International Law Foundations of Palestinian Nationality; a Legal Examination of Nationality in Palestine under Britain's Rule (2008)

-  Robinson - Citizen Strangers; Palestinians and the Birth of Israel's Liberal Settler State (2013)

-  Roy - Failing Peace; Gaza and the Palestinian-Israeli Conflict (2007)

-  Spingola - The Ruling Elite; the Zionist Seizure of World Power (2012)

-  Svirsky - After Israel; Towards Cultural Transformation (2014)

-  Walls - Framing the Israel-Palestine Conflict in Swedish History School Textbooks (2010)

-  Waxman - Trouble in the Tribe; the American Jewish Conflict Over Israel (2016)
